main event: A bright oval object was spotted flickering on and off before disappearing at a high altitude near Clark AFB.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes,The object was described as a dull red while climbing,The object flickered on and off at intervals,The description of the object fits that of a balloon,No photographs were documented with the report.
witness description: mature individuals, including an observer and their son aged eleven
